subject: Track and Field
Millrose Games
Halls of Fame
lead_paragraph: Fred Schmertz, the director of the Millrose Games for 41 years, will be joined by his son, Howard, who succeeded him, in the Millrose Hall of Fame.
snippet: Fred Schmertz, the director of the Millrose Games for 41 years, will be joined by his son, Howard, who succeeded him, in the Millrose Hall of Fame.
